New Records: Rohit Sharma (4165) vaulted past Virat Kohli (4103) to the top of the run-scoring leaderboard in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Jofra Archer lbw b Bumrah 21 (15b 1x4 2x6 17m) SR: 140.
India are unbeaten in the T20 World Cup 2024.
England reached the semi-final with some hiccups.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a high-stakes match between India and England.
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of calmness in the dressing room.
Matthew Mott highlighted the excitement and competitiveness expected in the match.
The Bumrah, Archer, and Kuldeep overs were identified as pivotal.
Adil Rashid was highlighted as a key threat against India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guyana has been a tricky venue for run-scoring throughout the T20 World Cup, with a run rate of 6.20 and an average of 14.67.
Spin has been a significant weapon at Providence in this tournament, with 27 wickets falling in five previous matches, at a strike-rate of 17.1.
If the match is washed out, India will progress to the final after topping their group in the Super Eight.
